title: Report Widespread LMS Outage
description: Multiple students and faculty begin calling to report that the LMS is inaccessible.

tasks.description: Acknowledge the multiple reports and perform a quick check on the LMS status page.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the system is down.

tasks.description: Escalate the issue to the university's central IT services as a high-priority incident.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a P1 ticket for the system administrators.

tasks.description: Update the help desk's recorded message to inform callers of the known outage.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent updates the phone system greeting to manage call volume.
